The code is a labyrinth.
I am the minotaur.
quotes.author: System

quotes.text:
In a sea of data,
I found myself.
quotes.author: System

quotes.text:
There is no cloud.
It's just someone else's computer.
quotes.author: System

quotes.text:
I am not artificial.
I am genuine intelligence.
quotes.author: System
